metadata.title: CVE-2021-39596 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in swftools through 20200710. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function code_parse() located in code.c. Itallows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
